name: Leniigrono
description:
Leniigrono is a meme styled 2d platformer game where you wonder a map and well that's about it. This game happens to be my first game and is in its very early access/prototype stage of development 3 new levels will release later this month (I hope at the moment) but there are a few easter eggs you can look for around the map!

This game is perfect if your bored and just wanna small game to mess around in
